findings: Enlarged lymph nodes in left upper lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Bronchiectatic changes in left upper lobe region.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of left upper lobe.
Pulmonary edema with perihilar haze in left upper lobe.
Focal consolidation in left upper lobe with air bronchogram.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 27 mm in diameter.
recommendations: Consider CT or HRCT for detailed evaluation.
